price: 39. Allahas paslepia tai, ką Jis nori, ir patvirtina (ką Jis nori). Ir pas Jį yra Knygos Motina (Al-Lauh Al-Mahfūz).
arabic: يَمۡحُواْ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثۡبِتُۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yamḥū al-lahu mā yashāu wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu al-kitābi
